name: Magma Shot
description: A powerful fire move that increases in power when used in succession.

name: Burning Lash
description: A powerful fire move that increases in power when used in succession.

name: Inferno
description: The target is hit with an intense blast of fire. This move can burn the target if used 3 times in a row.

name: Firebrand
description: The target is hit with pieces of burning wood. This move can burn the target if used 3 times in a row.

name: Flaming Fists
description: A powerful fire move that can hit both beasts of the opponent. Its power is reduced by 30% when hitting more than one target.

name: Aqua Blast
description: A powerful water move that increases in power when used in succession.

name: Depth Attack
description: A powerful water move that increases in power when used in succession.

name: Torrential Blast
description: The user unleashes torrential waves of water to hit the opponent. This move cures the user and partner’s status conditions and resets stat changes on the target if used 3 times in a row.

name: Crosstide
description: The user strikes the opponent with a blast of powerful water. This move cures the user and partner’s status conditions and resets stat changes on the target if used 3 times in a row.

name: Crashing Waves
description: A powerful water move that can hit both beasts of the opponent. Its power is reduced by 30% when hitting more than one target.

name: Thicket Thrash
description: A powerful plant move that increases in power when used in succession.

name: Bark Blast
description: A powerful plant move that increases in power when used in succession.

name: Bloomburst
description: A glittering burst of flowers strikes the opponent. This move can put the target to sleep if used 3 times in a row.

name: Petal Scythe
description: Mysterious petals form a devastating blade to damage the opponent. This move can put the target to sleep if used 3 times in a row.

name: Untamed Growth
description: A powerful plant move that can hit both beasts of the opponent. Its power is reduced by 30% when hitting more than one target.

name: Luminescence
description: A powerful light move that increases in power when used in succession.

name: Flashing Fist
description: A powerful light move that increases in power when used in succession.

name: Illuminating Beam
description: A powerful beam made of light strikes the opponent. This move raises the user’s highest offensive stat if used 3 times in a row.

name: Sunblade
description: The user creates a blade with the power of the sun to damage the opponent. This move raises the user’s highest offensive stat if used 3 times in a row.

name: Dawngrasp
description: A powerful light move that can hit both beasts of the opponent. Its power is reduced by 30% when hitting more than one target.

name: Dark Harvest
description: A powerful dark move that increases in power when used in succession.

name: Shade Slash
description: A powerful dark move that increases in power when used in succession.

name: Total Eclipse
description: A terrifying shadow surrounds the opponent to do damage. This move can land a critical hit if used 3 times in a row.

name: Shadowblade
description: The user creates a blade-like pulse with the power of the shadows to do damage. This move can land a critical hit if used 3 times in a row.

name: Night’s Embrace
description: A powerful dark move that can hit both beasts of the opponent. Its power is reduced by 30% when hitting more than one target.

name: Soul Contract
description: A powerful spirit move that increases in power when used in succession.

name: Oni Slash
description: A powerful spirit move that increases in power when used in succession.

name: Spirit Beam
description: A mysterious beam from a different dimension strikes the opponent. This move recovers half of the user’s max HP if used 3 times in a row.

name: Otherside Embrace
description: Mysterious forces from another dimension hit the opponent. This move recovers half of the user’s max HP if used 3 times in a row.

name: Mass Abduction
description: A powerful spirit move that can hit both beasts of the opponent. Its power is reduced by 30% when hitting more than one target.

name: Thunderous Boom
description: A powerful electric move that increases in power when used in succession.

name: Zap Razor
description: A powerful electric move that increases in power when used in succession.

name: Lightning Bolt
description: A powerful blast of electricity hits the target. This move can paralyze the target if used 3 times in a row.

name: Strike Conduit
description: The user strikes the target with electric shakings. This move can paralyze the target if used 3 times in a row.

name: Electric Storm
description: A powerful electric move that can hit both beasts of the opponent. Its power is reduced by 30% when hitting more than one target.

name: Wind Breaker
description: A powerful wind move that increases in power when used in succession.

name: Wing Frenzy
description: A powerful wind move that increases in power when used in succession.

name: Vacuum Slice
description: Powerful wind slices are launched at the target. This move raises the user’s speed if used 3 times in a row.

name: Skyfall
description: The user hurls itself from the sky to damage the opponent. This move raises the user’s speed if used 3 times in a row.

name: Shear Stream
description: A powerful wind move that can hit both beasts of the opponent. Its power is reduced by 30% when hitting more than one target.

name: Quicksand Trap
description: A powerful earth move that increases in power when used in succession.

name: Sandstorm
description: A powerful earth move that increases in power when used in succession.

name: Titanic Quake
description: A powerful earth move that can hit both beasts of the opponent. Its power is reduced by 30% when hitting more than one target.

name: Seismic Wave
description: Using the power of earth, the user creates waves to damage the target. This move creates a mystic veil on the user’s side if used 3 times in a row.

name: Geologic Burst
description: An outstanding burst directly from the earth hits the target. This move creates a mystic veil on the user’s side if used 3 times in a row.

name: Degenerate
description: A powerful corrosion move that increases in power when used in succession.

name: Acrid Bite
description: A powerful corrosion move that increases in power when used in succession.

name: Acidic Flux
description: Acidic flux is thrown at the opponent to do damage. This move can corrode the target if used 3 times in a row.

name: Sulfuric Sting
description: A dangerous sting strikes the target with a poisonous force. This move can corrode the target if used 3 times in a row.

name: Chemical Crash
description: A powerful corrosion move that can hit both beasts of the opponent. Its power is reduced by 30% when hitting more than one target.

name: Meditative Strike
description: A powerful combat move that increases in power when used in succession.

name: Axe Kick
description: A powerful combat move that increases in power when used in succession.

name: Nerve Pulse
description: Outstanding pulse that shudders the opponent’s awareness. This move raises the user’s highest offensive stat if used 3 times in a row.

name: Roundhouse Slam
description: The user slams the target with its physical power. This move raises the user’s highest offensive stat if used 3 times in a row.

name: Fist Barrage
description: A powerful combat move that can hit both beasts of the opponent. Its power is reduced by 30% when hitting more than one target.

name: Steel Blast
description: A powerful metal move that increases in power when used in succession.

name: Iron Slam
description: A powerful metal move that increases in power when used in succession.

name: Ferrous Laser
description: Laser launched at the target with metal power. This move creates a natural veil on the user’s side if used 3 times in a row.

name: Metal Grinder
description: The target is pulverized by a metallic grinder. This move creates a natural veil on the user’s side if used 3 times in a row.

name: Silicon Slashes
description: A powerful metal move that can hit both beasts of the opponent. Its power is reduced by 30% when hitting more than one target.

name: Shield
description: The user creates a shield that protects it from all moves during the turn. This move cannot be used consecutively.

name: Ferocious Howl
description: This move raises the user and its partner’s Natural Attack by one stage.

name: Arcane Knowledge
description: This move raises the user’s Mystic Attack by one stage.

name: Armor Up
description: This move raises the user's Natural Defense by one stage.

name: Sparkling Barrier
description: This move raises the user's Mystic Defense by one stage.

name: Spring
description: This move raises the user's Speed by one stage.

name: Assault Rush
description: This move raises the user's Natural Attack by two stages.

name: Introspection
description: This move raises the user's Mystic Attack by two stages.

name: Bunker Down
description: This move raises the user's Natural Defense by two stages.

name: Glowing Mists
description: This move raises the user's Mystic Defense by two stages.

name: Acceleration
description: This move raises the user's Speed by two stages.

name: Team Help
description: This move increases the partner's damage by 50% during the turn.

name: Redirection Sign
description: Using a lure, the user redirects all moves from the opponent to itself during the turn.

name: Fire Blaze
description: The target is hit directly with fire causing it to get burned. It loses some HP every turn and its natural attack is halved.

name: Sleep Pollen
description: The user launches a magical pollen to the target causing it to fall asleep for one turn.

name: Nature Protection
description: A mysterious force from the nature protects the user's team from status conditions for five turns.

name: Provocation
description: The user provokes and enrages the opponent making it unable to use status moves for 3 turns.

name: Natural Veil
description: The user creates a Veil on its side of the field that reduces the damage taken from natural moves for 5 turns.

name: Mystic Veil
description: The user creates a Veil on its side of the field that reduces the damage taken from mystic moves for 5 turns.

name: Meditate
description: The user concentrates deeply and recovers half of its max HP. The recovery is reduced each turn if this move is used in succession. Paralysis condition makes the recovery to always be 25%.

name: Paralysis Wave
description: A sudden wave of electricity is thrown at the opponent causing it to get paralyzed and drastically reducing its speed.

name: Corrosive Wave
description: A corrosive wave hits the target’s body causing it to get corroded. The target loses a great amount of HP every turn.

name: Soft Reset
description: A mysterious mist affects the battle field and resets all stat changes.

name: Jungle Healing
description: With the power of the jungle, the user’s entire team is recovered from every status condition.

name: Charging Flame
description: This move inflicts damage with the user’s highest offensive stat, the user then increases its Natural or Mystic Attack. This move doubles in power if resisted by a beast with the same element of the move.

name: Charging Wave
description: This move inflicts damage with the user’s highest offensive stat, the user then increases its Natural or Mystic Attack. This move doubles in power if resisted by a beast with the same element of the move.

name: Charging Leaf
description: This move inflicts damage with the user’s highest offensive stat, the user then increases its Natural or Mystic Attack. This move doubles in power if resisted by a beast with the same element of the move.

name: Charging Beam
description: This move inflicts damage with the user’s highest offensive stat, the user then increases its Natural or Mystic Attack. This move doubles in power if resisted by a beast with the same element of the move.

name: Charging Shadow
description: This move inflicts damage with the user’s highest offensive stat, the user then increases its Natural or Mystic Attack. This move doubles in power if resisted by a beast with the same element of the move.

name: Charging Spell
description: This move inflicts damage with the user’s highest offensive stat, the user then increases its Natural or Mystic Attack. This move doubles in power if resisted by a beast with the same element of the move.

name: Charging Gust
description: This move inflicts damage with the user’s highest offensive stat, the user then increases its Natural or Mystic Attack. This move doubles in power if resisted by a beast with the same element of the move.

name: Charging Atom
description: This move inflicts damage with the user’s highest offensive stat, the user then increases its Natural or Mystic Attack. This move doubles in power if resisted by a beast with the same element of the move.

name: Charging Oxide
description: This move inflicts damage with the user’s highest offensive stat, the user then increases its Natural or Mystic Attack. This move doubles in power if resisted by a beast with the same element of the move.

name: Charging Pulse
description: This move inflicts damage with the user’s highest offensive stat, the user then increases its Natural or Mystic Attack. This move doubles in power if resisted by a beast with the same element of the move.

name: Charging Iron
description: This move inflicts damage with the user’s highest offensive stat, the user then increases its Natural or Mystic Attack. This move doubles in power if resisted by a beast with the same element of the move.

name: Maddening Scream
description: The user madly screams at the target causing it to reduce its Natural and Mystic Attack by one stage. This move will go first when used the first turn the beast is sent to the battle.
